text: Perlenbach is a river of North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany and eastern Belgium. Its source is in the Belgian High Fens, north of Büllingen. It is dammed up to create a lake, before flowing from the right into the Rur near Monschau. ==See also== *Perlenbach Valley *List of rivers of North Rhine-Westphalia ==References== Category:Rivers of the Eifel Category:Rivers of North Rhine- Westphalia Category:Rivers of Belgium Category:Belgium–Germany border Category:Rivers of Germany Category:Rivers of Liège (province) Category:International rivers of Europe Category:Border rivers
title: Perlenbach (Rur)
